languages.text: "Признаться, сам себе удивляюсь. Для того, кто должен заботиться о благосостоянии династии, всякая чувствительность сродни пороку. Однако, ничего не могу с собой поделать, потому и облегчил душу в исповеди".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, сам себе удивляюсь. Для того, кто должен заботиться о благосостоянии династии, всякая чувствительность сродни пороку. Однако, ничего не могу с собой поделать, потому и облегчил душу в исповеди".

languages.text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, сам себе удивляюсь. Для того, кто должен заботиться о благосостоянии династии, всякая чувствительность сродни пороку. Однако, ничего не могу с собой поделать, потому и облегчил душу в исповеди".

traits.locale_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
"As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
"As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
"As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
"As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

languages.text: “说实话，我也同样惊讶。对负责确保王朝繁荣的人而言，多愁善感是一种恶行。不过，我实在是没办法，于是我只好通过忏悔，卸下了灵魂的重担。”
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

traits.locale_text: “说实话，我也同样惊讶。对负责确保王朝繁荣的人而言，多愁善感是一种恶行。不过，我实在是没办法，于是我只好通过忏悔，卸下了灵魂的重担。”

languages.text: «Igual que a mí, ciertamente. La sensibilidad es un vicio para quien tiene la responsabilidad de garantizar la prosperidad de su dinastía. No obstante, soy presa de ella, y por eso debo aliviar las tribulaciones de mi alma mediante la confesión».
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

traits.locale_text: «Igual que a mí, ciertamente. La sensibilidad es un vicio para quien tiene la responsabilidad de garantizar la prosperidad de su dinastía. No obstante, soy presa de ella, y por eso debo aliviar las tribulaciones de mi alma mediante la confesión».

languages.text: 「実を言うと、私もそうです。王朝の繁栄の責任者にとって、繊細さは悪癖です。しかし、私は変わることができない。だからこそ、懺悔で魂の荷を下ろしたのです」
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

traits.locale_text: 「実を言うと、私もそうです。王朝の繁栄の責任者にとって、繊細さは悪癖です。しかし、私は変えることができない。だからこそ、懺悔で魂の重荷を下ろしたのです」

languages.text: "Ich auch, um ehrlich zu sein. Sensibilität ist eine Schwäche, wenn man für die Wahrung des Wohlstandes der Dynastie verantwortlich ist. Aber ich kann nichts dagegen tun, deshalb entlaste ich meine Seele durch die Beichte."
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

traits.locale_text: "Ich auch, um ehrlich zu sein. Sensibilität ist eine Schwäche, wenn man für die Wahrung des Wohlstandes der Dynastie verantwortlich ist. Aber ich kann nichts dagegen tun, deshalb entlaste ich meine Seele durch die Beichte."

languages.text: « Moi aussi, pour tout vous avouer. La sensiblerie est une faiblesse chez un individu qui comme moi doit assurer la prospérité de la dynastie. Malheureusement, c'est plus fort que moi, raison pour laquelle j'ai épanché mon âme en confession. »
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, pour tout vous avouer. La sensiblerie est une faiblesse chez un individu qui comme moi doit assurer la prospérité de la dynastie. Malheureusement, c'est plus fort que moi, raison pour laquelle j'ai épanché mon âme en confession. »

languages.text: "Dürüst olmam gerekirse ben de şaşırdım. Hassasiyet, hanedanlığın refahından sorumlu birisi için kusur sayılır. Ancak buna mâni olamıyorum. Bundandır ki günah çıkararak üzerimdeki yükü hafiflettim."
languages.original_text: "As am I, to tell the truth. Sensitivity is a vice in one responsible for ensuring the dynasty's prosperity. However, I cannot help it, which is why I unburdened my soul in confession."
